description.description: A human readable description of an entity

mad_3d_dist.description: Median absolute deviation of the 3D distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

mad_z_dist.description: Median absolute deviation of the Z distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

mean_3d_dist.description: Mean of the 3D distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

mean_z_dist.description: Mean of the Z distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

median_3d_dist.description: Median of the 3D distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

argolight_b_image.description: Input parameter: image of the argolight b pattern in the order TZYXC

lower_threshold_correction_factors.description: Input parameter: correction factor for the lower thresholds.  Must be a list with length equal to the number of channels or a single float if all equal

remove_center_cross.description: Input parameter: remove the center cross found in some Argolight patterns

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma_x.description: Smoothing factor for objects detection in the X axis

sigma_y.description: Smoothing factor for objects detection in the Y axis

sigma_z.description: Smoothing factor for objects detection in the Z axis

spots_distance.description: Input parameter: distance between argolight spots

upper_threshold_correction_factors.description: Input parameter: correction factor for the upper thresholds. Must be a tuple with length equal to the number of channels or a single float if all equal

channel_nr.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

intensity_max_spot.description: Integrated intensity of the most intense spot for each channel

intensity_max_spot_roi.description: ROI number of the most intense spot for each channel

intensity_min_spot.description: Integrated intensity of the least intense spot for each channel

intensity_min_spot_roi.description: ROI number of the least intense spot for each channel

mad_mean_intensity.description: Median absolute deviation of all spots integrated intensity for each channel

mean_intensity.description: Mean of all spots integrated intensity for each channel

median_intensity.description: Median of all spots integrated intensity for each channel

min_max_intensity_ratio.description: Ratio between the integrated intensities between the most intense and the least intense spots for each channel

nr_of_spots.description: Number of argolight spots detected for each channel

ArgolightEDataset.description:
An Argolight sample pattern E dataset.
It contains resolution data on the axis indicated:
- axis 1 = Y resolution = lines along X axis
- axis 2 = X resolution = lines along Y axis

prominence_threshold.description: Peak prominence used as a threshold to distinguish two peaks.  Defaults to the value defined by the Rayleigh criteria

peak_prominence_A.description: Prominence of first peak in the intensity profiles. One value per channel

corner_fraction.description: Input parameter: the proportion of the image to be considered as corner or center

field_illumination_image.description: Input parameter: homogeneity image provided in the order TZYXC. While the analysis accepts multiple channels, the T and Z dimensions are expected to be 1.

intensity_map_size.description: Input parameter: the size of the output intensity map in pixels

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma.description: Input parameter: the sigma for the smoothing gaussian filter to be applied prior to analysis

bottom_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-center of the image

bottom_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

bottom_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-left of the image

bottom_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-left of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

bottom_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-right of the image

bottom_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-right of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

center_fitted_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the fitted center of illumination to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image.

center_fitted_x.description: The x coordinate of the fitted center of illumination. In pixels

center_fitted_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the fitted center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge.

center_fitted_y.description: The y coordinate of the fitted center of illumination. In pixels

center_fitted_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the fitted center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge.

center_geometric_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the geometric center to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image.

center_geometric_x.description: The x coordinate of the geometric center of the center of illumination region. In pixels

center_geometric_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the geometric center of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge.

center_geometric_y.description: The y coordinate of the geometric center of the center of illumination region. In pixels. One value per channel.

center_geometric_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the geometric center of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the centers of mass to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_x.description: The x coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. In pixels. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the center of mass of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_y.description: The y coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. In pixels. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the center of mass of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge. One value per channel.

center_region_area_fraction.description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. If the centre upper intensity fraction is 0.1, that means that the center of illumination occupies 10% of the area of the image. One value per channel.

center_region_intensity_fraction.description: The fraction of the upper intensity range occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel.

channel_nr.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

data_uri.description: The URI of the object data

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

max_intensity.description: The maximum intensity of the center of illumination

max_intensity_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the maximum intensity to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image.

max_intensity_pos_x.description: The x coordinate of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination. In pixels

max_intensity_pos_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge.

max_intensity_pos_y.description: The y coordinate of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination. In pixels

max_intensity_pos_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge.

middle_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-center of the image

middle_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

middle_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-left of the image

middle_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-left of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

middle_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-right of the image

middle_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-right of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-center of the image

top_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-left corner of the image

top_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-left corner of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-right corner of the image

top_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-right corner of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

comment.description: A human readable comment about the dataset

errors.description: The errors of the processing by microscope-metrics

intensity_maps.description: Intensity map of the field illumination

intensity_profiles.description: Intensity profiles for the field illumination analysis in the different directions

key_values.description: Key-Value pairs containing the Key measurements for the field illumination analysis

roi_centers_fitted.description: Point ROIs marking the fitted center of the area of maximum illumination. One point per channel.

roi_centers_geometric.description: Point ROIs marking the geometric center of the area of maximum illumination. One point per channel.

roi_centers_max_intensity.description: Point ROIs marking the maximum intensity of the area of maximum illumination. One point per channel.

roi_centers_of_mass.description: Point ROIs marking the center of mass of the area of maximum illumination. When the image is very flat, the 99 percentile is used instead. One point per channel.

roi_corners.description: Rectangular ROIs used to compute the corner intensities. The sama ROI is assigned to multiple images.

roi_profiles.description: line ROIs used to compute the intensity profiles

fitting_rss_threshold.description: Threshold for the residual sum of squares of the fit to be considered good.

intensity_robust_z_score_threshold.description: Threshold for the robust z-score of the intensity of the bead to be considered good.

min_lateral_distance_factor.description: Minimal distance that has to separate laterally the beads represented as the  number of times the FWHM of the beads.

psf_beads_images.description: The image containing the beads provided in the order TZYXC. More than one image can be provided if the image conditions are the same.

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma_x.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in the X axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

sigma_y.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in teh Y axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

sigma_z.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in the Z axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

snr_threshold.description: Signal to noise ratio threshold to be used for bead detection.

channel_nr.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

data_uri.description: The URI of the object data

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

fit_rss_x_mean.description: Mean residual sum of squares in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_x_median.description: Median residual sum of squares in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_x_std.description: Standard deviation of the residual sum of squares in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_y_mean.description: Mean residual sum of squares in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_y_median.description: Median residual sum of squares in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_y_std.description: Standard deviation of the residual sum of squares in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_z_mean.description: Mean residual sum of squares in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_z_median.description: Median residual sum of squares in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_rss_z_std.description: Standard deviation of the residual sum of squares in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

name.description: The human readable name of an entity

nr_of_beads_analyzed.description: Number of beads analyzed. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_considered_axial_edge.description: Number of beads considered as being too close to the top and or bottom of the image. These beads are not considered for the z axis FWHM measurements. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_considered_bad_x_fit.description: Number of beads considered as having a bad fit quality in the x axis. The fitting meassureemnts are  not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_considered_bad_y_fit.description: Number of beads considered as having a bad fit quality in the y axis. The fitting meassureemnts are  not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_considered_bad_z_fit.description: Number of beads considered as having a bad fit quality in the z axis. The fitting meassureemnts are  not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_considered_intensity_outlier.description: Number of beads considered as being too intense and potentially represent a cluster of beads. These beads have a robust z-score over the requested threshold. Measurements on these beads are not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_discarded_lateral_edge.description: Number of beads discarded for being too close to the edge of the image. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_discarded_self_proximity.description: Number of beads discarded for being too close to another bead. One value per channel.

omero_host.description: The host of the OMERO server

omero_object_id.description: The ID of the OMERO object

omero_object_type.description: The type of the OMERO object

omero_port.description: The port of the OMERO server

resolution_mean_fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_r.description: Mean lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_x_microns.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_x_pixels.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_y_microns.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_y_pixels.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_z_microns.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_z_pixels.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_lateral_asymmetry.description: Median lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_x_microns.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_x_pixels.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_y_microns.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_y_pixels.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_z_microns.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_z_pixels.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_std_fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_ra.description: Standard deviation of the lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

resolution_std_fwhm_x_microns.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_std_fwhm_x_pixels.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_std_fwhm_y_microns.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_std_fwhm_y_pixels.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_std_fwhm_z_microns.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_std_fwhm_z_pixels.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

analyzed_bead_centers.description: The centers of the beads that have been analyzed. One point shape will be provided per bead correctly detected. One ROI per channel.

bead_crops.description: The crops of the beads provided in the order TZYXC. One crop will be provided per bead correctly detected.

bead_properties.description: Properties associated with the analysis of the beads.

bead_x_profiles.description: The intensity profiles along the x axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

bead_y_profiles.description: The intensity profiles along the y axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

bead_z_profiles.description: The intensity profiles along the z axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

comment.description: A human readable comment about the dataset

considered_bead_centers_axial_edge.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as too close to the top and or bottom of the image. Measurements not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_intensity_outlie.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as being too intense and potentially represent a cluster of beads. Intensity robust z-score over requested threshold. Measurements not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_x_fit_quality.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as the fit quality in x was not good enough.  RSS over requested threshold. Measurements in x not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_y_fit_quality.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as the fit quality in y was not good enough.  RSS over requested threshold. Measurements in y not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_z_fit_quality.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as the fit quality in z was not good enough.  RSS over requested threshold. Measurements in z not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

discarded_bead_centers_lateral_edge.description: The centers of the beads detected but discarded as too close to the edge of the image. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

discarded_bead_centers_self_proximity.description: The centers of the beads detected but discarded as too close to another bead. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.
